title: 4.CYB.1
text: The student will examine the impacts of appropriate and inappropriate use of computing technologies.
subject: Computer Science (2024)
subs: Examine and explain scenarios for appropriate and inappropriate use of computing technologies.
Develop possible solutions involving inappropriate use of computing technologies.

title: 4.CYB.2
text: The student will identify and investigate best practices to safeguard information shared online and through online platforms.
subject: Computer Science (2024)
subs: Classify personal, private, and public information.
Research and evaluate tradeoffs of sharing information.
Investigate and communicate best practices to limit unauthorized access to information on a computing device.
Demonstrate proper use and protection of personal passwords.
List methods used to safeguard online information.

title: 4.CYB.3
text: The student will examine how information is shared online and explain the importance of cybersecurity.
subject: Computer Science (2024)
subs: Investigate multiple ways people share information online.
Determine and describe when information should be shared and to whom it should be shared.
Describe how personal information can be collected and shared online.
